caller_intent: Chelsea is seeking clarification about a homeowner's insurance policy under an LLC (Pintail Properties of King LLC) to determine if it is on auto draft and whether payment responsibility lies with her office or the accountant.
resolution_steps: Heather acknowledges the call and confirms the policy details (LLC name).
Heather places the caller on hold to check the policy's auto draft status and payment history.
Heather provides hold music and a voicemail message with additional contact options (portal, texting).
knowledge_required: Understanding how to check policy details (auto draft status, payment history) in the agency's system.
Knowledge of typical insurance policy management workflows for LLC-owned properties.
systems_referenced: Alliance Insurance Services internal policy management system
summary: Chelsea from Doctor Edward Bell's office contacted Alliance Insurance Services to clarify whether a homeowner's insurance policy under Pintail Properties of King LLC is on auto draft and who is responsible for payment. The agent placed the call on hold to verify policy details, with a follow-up expected.
